title: After The Party....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Oh, look at this one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hahaha, Chika-chan’s face~! She looked so happy here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. She got some Christmas limited school idol merch, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s right. She was really disappointed back then because they were all sold out in Numazu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then, let’s make this our first picture.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re right. I think it would make a great opener to our Christmas party album!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>We made some fun memories, huh♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hey, Nozomi-san, look at this one. It’s Nico-san’s special karaage platter! There was so much, but it was all gone in no time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>We also finished Kana-chan’s cake so fast.... Look at this one. Honoka-chan has such a big smile in front of the cake!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Aaah~, the party was a ton of fun. I can’t wait to finish organizing the album and show it to everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
